content: begins the top of the piece 5 ch1 turn increase single_crochet to the end 18 6 ch1 turn decrease x2 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 18 7 ch1 turn slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet-increase x3 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 3 12 not counting slip_stitch s 8 ch1 turn skip first stitch slip_stitch single_crochet 8 slip_stitch then slip_stitch into round 7 fo leave very long tail for sewing - sew over left eye - using tail to sew around outer edges and to sew snugly around the edge of the safety eye use black to carefully stitch on a line of eyeliner around the edge of each safety eye small forehead spot - light brown 1 single_crochet 8 into magic_ring 2 increase x2 single_crochet 2 increase x2 single_crochet 2 12 3 single_crochet increase x3 single_crochet 9 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing - sew spot to forehead over the right eye back spots - make 1 of each - in light brown big spot - 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 5 around 21 - slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing small spot - 1 single_crochet 8 into magic_ring 2 increase around 16 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing the small spot goes just above the tail and the big spot goes just above the small one use a small amount of black to stitch on a small smile over the black of the muzzle
